topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5563899263687216d01d2800#post_5563899263687216d01d2800
SAO is one of those anime's where I fined they do ok at the first half of it and than it just flops.

For starters I finished the first SAO. And even though I could bare through it I found the first sets of episodes were cool and than it just kind of flopped the rest of the way through.

And than SAO 2 came out and it did the same thing. the first parts of it all where he's trying to fined and fight Metal Face (Or whatever his name was) is awesome.

But than the rest of it after he fought Metal Face turned into a Giant filler that I was just not interested in or invested to watch. 

Like Pat and Liam said the show has a fucking awesome Premise but it just cant seem to hold it well like it should.

topics.body:
You want a prime example of how just cause you give tons of money to animation studios won't actually mean that the final product will be good (although it's not a anime)?
!http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/710/395/0b0.gif!

That movie cost $65,000,000 to make!  If something is *THAT* poorly animated for that amount of money then chances are the creators don't care.
